name: r/Place Guesser
description:
Might not work on your phone. (FireFox works ok on phone) Please use a PC if possible :)

How to play:

You get 5 seconds to look at a small part of the image

Then you need to locate that image.

Repeat this for 5 rounds.

Points will be given depending on you accuracy, speed and difficulty.

Have fun i guess

If you have any issues please dm me on reddit u/Simto1.
